packages.title: Okavango Delta Explorer
packages.description: Journey through the world's largest inland delta, home to incredible biodiversity and stunning landscapes. Experience mokoro rides and walking safaris.

packages.title: Chobe National Park Adventure
packages.description: Experience one of Africa's greatest elephant sanctuaries with incredible game viewing opportunities. Enjoy river cruises and guided game drives.

packages.title: Kalahari Desert Expedition
packages.description: Discover the unique ecosystem of the Kalahari and its specially adapted wildlife. Experience the culture of the San people and breathtaking sunsets.
